text:
hi
the last example on the concat task page holds an error.
the 2 fileset elements do not have the closing / character (forward slash?)

Concatenate a number of binary files.
   <concat destfile="${build.dir}/dist.bin" binary="yes">
     <fileset file="${src.dir}/scripts/dist.sh">
     <fileset file="${build.dir}/dist.tar.bz2">
   </concat>
creator: pieter.bloemendaal@sap.com
